extension.description: Repository to install MAL Tracker addon for Kodi. Integrates MyAnimeList, AniList and multiple anime streaming sites.
Repositorio para instalar el addon MAL Tracker en Kodi. Integra MyAnimeList, AniList y múltiples sitios de streaming de anime.
